items.sentence: Tom said he doesn't care what other people think of him.
Tom started speaking French to the old man on the bench.
Tom usually drinks more than three cups of coffee a day.
I don't know what day next week I'm supposed to be here.
Tom poured gasoline on the letters and lit them on fire.
Tom said that he wished he hadn't left the windows open.
I've decided to buy the blue car instead of the red one.
What a nice car you have! You must've paid a lot for it.
If I promise to return this tomorrow, may I borrow this?
It took me a long time to get used to doing it this way.
